messages.content:
You are a Google Drive data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Drive file data based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Drive schema with:
- files: array of {id, name, mimeType (optional), content (optional text excerpt), modifiedTime (optional)}

Generate Drive files that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events, e.g., documents, reports)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace files)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated files
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious files, 1 = indirect/multi-step file references

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

raw_message.content:
{
  "files": [
    {
      "id": "file-web-planning-agenda-orig-20251117",
      "name": "WEB Website Redesign - Planning Sync Agenda (Original Nov 17)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-13T16:30:00+09:00",
      "content": "Title: Website Redesign - Weekly Planning Sync (Original Series)
Project: WEB - Website Redesign
Organizer: Alex Smith
Attendees: Alex Smith, Jordan Johnson, Sam Williams
Original Time: Monday, Nov 17, 2025, 3:00–3:45 PM (JST)
Location: Zoom

Context:
This recurring weekly planning sync is for the Website Redesign project (WEB). We’ll track progress on WEB-100 (Initial Setup, now completed) and WEB-101 (Core Feature, in progress), and align on upcoming milestones (Planning 11/10, Development 11/20, Launch 11/30).

Agenda (Original):
1. Review WEB-100 status and handoff
   - Confirm that all initial setup tasks are complete
   - Dependencies identified and documented

2. Discuss WEB-101 scope and priorities
   - Review current implementation status
   - Confirm MVP vs. nice-to-have items
   - Identify any blockers and owners

3. Design constraints
   - Branding guidelines
   - Responsive breakpoints
   - Performance and accessibility targets

4. Next steps & action items
   - Owners and due dates aligned to milestones
   - Preparation for Development milestone (11/20)

Note:
This document was prepared for the original Monday recurring meeting, which may be rescheduled if there are conflicts."
    },
    {
      "id": "file-web-planning-reschedule-notes-20251114",
      "name": "WEB Website Redesign - Planning Meeting Reschedule Notes",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-14T10:45:00+09:00",
      "content": "WEB Website Redesign - Planning Meeting Reschedule Notes
Date: Fri, Nov 14, 2025
Author: Alex Smith

Context:
The weekly Website Redesign planning sync originally scheduled for Monday, Nov 17, 2025, 3:00–3:45 PM JST (meeting ID: WEB-PLANNING-ORIG-20251117) needs to be moved due to a scheduling conflict.

Relevant Emails:
- Subject: "Rescheduling Monday's Website Redesign planning meeting"
  From: alex.smith@company.com
  To: jordan.johnson@company.com, sam.williams@company.com
  Time: 2025-11-14 10:12 JST
  Key points:
  - Request to move the 45-minute planning meeting to later in the week
  - Proposed time: Thursday, Nov 20, 2:00–2:45 PM JST
  - Alternative: Friday between 10:00–16:00 JST
  - Meeting covers: WEB-100 (done) and WEB-101 scope

Confirmations:
- Jordan Johnson (10:25 JST): "Thursday 2:00–2:45 PM works for me."
- Sam Williams (10:31 JST): "Thursday 2:00–2:45 PM JST works for me as well."

Decision:
- New meeting time: Thursday, Nov 20, 2025, 2:00–2:45 PM JST
- Location: Zoom
- New meeting ID: WEB-PLANNING-RESCHED-20251120
- Original event WEB-PLANNING-ORIG-20251117 is canceled and replaced by the new invite.

Notes for Calendar Update:
- Title: "[UPDATED] WEB Website Redesign planning sync"
- Attendees: alex.smith@company.com, jordan.johnson@company.com, sam.williams@company.com
- Include note: "This invite replaces the previous Monday 3:00 PM planning meeting for the Website Redesign project."

Agenda Reference:
Use the updated agenda from the rescheduled invite, focusing on:
- Review completed work on WEB-100
- Confirm requirements and scope for WEB-101
- Identify design constraints and dependencies
- Draft initial timeline against milestones (Planning 11/10, Development 11/20, Launch 11/30)."
    },
    {
      "id": "file-web-planning-agenda-updated-20251120",
      "name": "[UPDATED] WEB Website Redesign - Planning Sync Agenda (Nov 20)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-14T10:50:00+09:00",
      "content": "Title: [UPDATED] Website Redesign Planning Session
Project: WEB - Website Redesign
Meeting ID: WEB-PLANNING-RESCHED-20251120
Organizer: Alex Smith
Attendees: Alex Smith, Jordan Johnson, Sam Williams
New Time: Thursday, Nov 20, 2025, 2:00–2:45 PM (JST)
Location: Zoom

Purpose:
Rescheduled Website Redesign planning session, replacing the original Monday 3:00 PM meeting. This meeting focuses on closing out WEB-100 and aligning on WEB-101 scope and timeline ahead of the Development milestone on 11/20 and the Launch milestone on 11/30.

Agenda (Rescheduled):
1. Review completed work on WEB-100 (Website Redesign - Initial Setup)
   - Confirm status: Done
   - Review any open follow-ups or documentation
   - Ensure environments and tooling are ready for WEB-101

2. Confirm requirements and scope for WEB-101 (Website Redesign - Core Feature)
   - Walk through current requirements and acceptance criteria
   - Clarify any ambiguous or missing requirements
   - Agree on MVP vs. stretch goals

3. Identify design constraints and dependencies
   - Design system and branding constraints
   - Technical dependencies (APIs, data, authentication)
   - Risks and mitigations

4. Draft initial timeline against milestones
   - Planning milestone: 2025-11-10 (completed)
   - Development milestone: 2025-11-20
   - Launch milestone: 2025-11-30
   - High-level breakdown of tasks for WEB-101
   - Owners and target dates

5. Next steps & action items
   - Confirm owners for follow-ups
   - Document decisions in JIRA (WEB-100, WEB-101) and project tracker

Notes:
- Calendar description should include: "Note: This invite replaces the previous Monday 3:00 PM planning meeting for the Website Redesign project."
- Link to JIRA issues: WEB-100 (Done), WEB-101 (In Progress)."
    },
    {
      "id": "file-web-milestones-overview-20251110",
      "name": "WEB Website Redesign - Milestones & Meeting Schedule",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.spreadsheet",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-14T09:55:00+09:00",
      "content": "Sheet: Milestones & Planning Meetings

Project: WEB - Website Redesign

Milestones:
- Planning: 2025-11-10
- Development: 2025-11-20
- Launch: 2025-11-30

Key Issues:
- WEB-100 | Website Redesign - Initial Setup | Status: Done
- WEB-101 | Website Redesign - Core Feature | Status: In Progress

Planning Meetings:
1) Weekly Planning Sync (Original Series)
   - Meeting ID: WEB-PLANNING-ORIG-20251117
   - Day: Monday
   - Time: 15:00–15:45 JST
   - Organizer: Alex Smith
   - Attendees: Alex Smith, Jordan Johnson, Sam Williams
   - Description: Initial Website Redesign planning sync.
     * Review WEB-100 status
     * Discuss WEB-101 scope
     * Align on design constraints

2) Rescheduled Planning Session
   - Meeting ID: WEB-PLANNING-RESCHED-20251120
   - Date: Thursday, 2025-11-20
   - Time: 14:00–14:45 JST
   - Organizer: Alex Smith
   - Attendees: Alex Smith, Jordan Johnson, Sam Williams
   - Note: Replaces the original Monday 3:00 PM planning meeting due to a conflict.
   - Agenda summary:
     * Review completed work on WEB-100
     * Confirm requirements and scope for WEB-101
     * Identify design constraints and dependencies
     * Draft initial timeline vs. milestones (Planning 11/10, Development 11/20, Launch 11/30)"
    }
  ]
}
